import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './Profile.css' import ThemeContext from '../../helper/ThemeContext' import Button from '../../components/Button/Button' import cv from '../../assets/file/Maksym_Dovbyk_frontend_developer.pdf' export default function Profile() { const themeContext = useContext(ThemeContext) return (

Hi, my name is Maksym

I am a front-end developer.

) }
